title: Rani Haar: Majestic Emerald and Ruby Gulbandh Necklace
features: This exquisite gulbandh showcases intricate filigree work (jalli) on the gold settings, framing a vibrant ruby and emerald centerpieces. Features traditional peacock (Mayura) motifs crafted with Nakshi craftsmanship, reflecting South Indian heritage. The emerald strands are carefully hand-knotted with delicate pearl accents, creating a layered, regal effect. Adjustable Dori closure provides a comfortable fit.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece perfect for adding a touch of timeless elegance to any special occasion.
description: A true heirloom piece, handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail using traditional South Indian techniques. The combination of emeralds, rubies, and polki diamonds creates a mesmerizing sparkle. The Rani Haar symbolizes prosperity, good fortune, and marital bliss, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish provides a lustrous finish that enhances the natural beauty of the gemstones.
